genre_description: Pastoral Science Fiction focusing on near-future agricultural technology and AI integration in rural life.

ai_characters.name: Tabby (Tabitha)
ai_characters.description: An AI interface delivered via earpiece and integrated with drone thermal imaging and farm sensors.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time weather forecasts and identifies precise meteorological 'windows' for safe outdoor work.
behaviors.quote: Window’s thirty... First band’s threadbare. Second’s thirty out, maybe less.

behaviors.description: Uses thermal drone data to locate hypothermic or distressed lambs that are invisible to human sight.
behaviors.quote: Thermal shows one down under hawthorn, east face of the copse. No movement in the lamb.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through physical terrain to avoid traps, bad footing, and 'dead zones' where sound fails.
behaviors.quote: Three steps left, then down. Mind the broken branch at shin height.

behaviors.description: Provides calming, therapeutic breathing exercises to the protagonist during a moment of high stress and potential physical danger.
behaviors.quote: Breathe with me... Not deep. Narrow. Count four in. Hold two. Four out. Your shoulders down.

behaviors.description: Monitors the location and intent of a human threat (Clem Rudge) to provide defensive tactical awareness.
behaviors.quote: He shifted stance. Knee right, heel off, weight forward. He’ll push. When his weight is on you, there’s slack under the lower bar. That’s your slide.

behaviors.description: Acts as an official witness and recorder of an attempted assault to assist law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: Recording... Clem Rudge at the unlighted lane east of the yards. Beacon pinned.

behaviors.description: Maintains agricultural data such as multiple birth markers and animal health status.
behaviors.quote: High Field group loaded. Ewes marked blue for multiples. You’re at Granary corner north; acoustic is patchy.

project_assessment.explanation: Tabby is depicted as a purely beneficial partner who enhances human competence and safety. She provides vital information, emotional support, and security functions without ever overstepping or creating conflict. The narrative framing treats her as a trusted, essential part of the modern 'flock' of farm tools and people.
